mapper.update: update items_tbl set item_title=#{item_title}, price=#{price}, content=#{content}, imagename=#{imagename} where item_code = #{item_code}
update items_tbl set num = num - 1 where num > #{num}
mapper.select: select item_size, quantity from item_size where item_code = #{item_code}
select item_color from item_color where item_code = #{item_code}
select item_id, item_code, item_title, price, content, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "reg_date", imagename, user_id from items_tbl order by num
select item_code, item_title, price, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "reg_date", imagename, num from items_tbl where user_id = #{user_id} order by num
select count(*) from items_tbl where item_code = #{item_code}
select item_code, item_title, price, to_char(reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "reg_date", imagename, user_id from items_tbl where user_id = #{user_id}
select * from items_tbl where item_title like '%' || #{name} || '%' or user_id like '%' || #{name} || '%'
